text:
@KeishaBottoms @GovKemp Wonder why Kemp never objected to the Deep State forcing him to wear (not just 1 but 2) shoes & a shirt in order to get service. 
Maybe his highly scientific mind just knows that the potential health scourge of "toe jam" & male nipple sweat are greater than COVID-19 could ever be
